ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject

Class Resources

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.Resources

  • public class Resources
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to define static resources in one place for easy access and to avoid cluttering the rest of the code base. All resources can be imported at once like this: import static ca.mcgill.ecse211.lab3.Resources.*;

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Resources.Point
      Represents a coordinate point on the competition map grid.
      static class  Resources.Region
      Represents a region on the competition map grid, delimited by its lower-left and upper-right corners (inclusive).
